Score.title: Score
Score.description: Represents a player's score in the Emoji Match Challenge game.

totalTime.description: The total time taken by the player to complete the game, in seconds.

moves.description: The number of moves taken by the player to complete the game.

submissionDate.description: The date and time when the score was submitted.

/scores/{scoreId}.description: Publicly accessible game scores. Any user can create a new score, and any user can read the list of scores for the leaderboard.
